description.value:
Up to four chains that the {type} can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-sharp barbs and animate under the {type}'s control, provided that the chains are not worn or carried.

Each animated chain is an object with an AC of 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When the {type} uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple a creature on its own but cannot make attacks while it is grappling. An animated chain returns to its inanimate state if it is reduced to 0 hit points or if the {type} is incapacitated or dies.
